name: Radi8 M8 - A Cherno-Bill Story
description:
In far away lands Cherno Bill scours the plains in search of Rad Pods. A man of pure radiation, he mutates the world and creatures around him. Constantly upgrading his modest hideout, he adventures out to the wastelands. However, many creatures afflicted with his intense radiation now stand in his way. Join him on his quest to exterminate them and gather as many radpods as he can.

Instructions
  • WASD to move
  • E to interact
  • Space to dash
On Adventure
  • Left Click to shoot
  • Right Click to shoot a massive burst
Tips
  • Gain temporary upgrades through the shops that turn up on your quest
  • Enemies mutate new augments over time. Kill them fast or be overwhelmed.
  • The level changes due to your intense energy. Doors that were closed by be open laters, and vice versa.
  • You don’t keep gold between adventures. Spend it all!
  • Spend your rads. Cherno Bill wants you to.
Changelog
  • Fixed rads not updating in run
  • Fixed upgrade names not displaying in hideout
  • Reduced difficulty numbers to make game beatable
  • Added linux and mac os builds (untested)
